Tales from the Penny Bloods, created by Arnold Schmidt & Julia Warren, presents ‘Old Time’ radio plays based on stories from popular nineteenth-century magazines. We dramatize fiction from prestigious Victorian gift annuals and the so-called "Penny Bloods" or "Penny Dreadfuls." You’ll hear thrilling tales in which London's high society meets the city's underworld, plus enjoy adventures & romances, ghosts & criminals, with a dash of comedy thrown in (https://linktr.ee/thepennybloodspodcast).
